sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button :type="type" :class="mode">
         <slot></slot>
         </button>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    props:['type', 'mode']
}
</script>
<style scoped>
 button{
        padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
        font-family: inherit;
        background-color: #5492bc;
        border: 1px solid #5492bc;
        color: white;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    button:hover,
    button:active{
        background-color: #052c41;
        border-color: #052c41;
    }
    .flat{
        background-color: transparent;
        color: #3a0061;
        border: none;
    }
    .flat:hover,
    .flat:active{
     background-color: #edd2ff;   
    }

        color: white;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    button:hover,
    button:active{
        background-color: #270041;
        border-color: #270041;
    }
    .flat{
        background-color: transparent;
        color: #3a0061;

    .flat:active{
     background-color: #edd2ff;
